cards.name: INTERCEPT
cards.descriptionBottom: Rebel ships cannot remove damage using 'cross-saber' this combat round.

cards.name: REINFORCEMENTS
cards.descriptionTop: Gain 1 TIE Fighter in this system. Prevent two black hits [o].

cards.name: OVERWHELMING PRESENCE
cards.descriptionTop: Prevent 2 red hits [o] and 1 direct hit *.

cards.name: ENTRAPMENT
cards.descriptionTop: Cancel the Rebel tactic card. You may play 1 additional space tactic card.
cards.descriptionBottom: Next combat round, the Rebel player cannot play a space tactic card.

cards.name: TRACTOR BEAM
cards.descriptionTop: At the end of this combat round, if there are no Rebel ships and at least 1 Star Destroyer in this system, you may capture 1 leader in this system.

cards.name: ENERGY SHIELD
cards.descriptionTop: After the Rebel player assigns damage, remove up to 2 damage from ships.
cards.descriptionBottom: Until the end of the combat, during space battles, you resolve your attacks after the Rebel player.

cards.name: SWARM TACTICS
cards.descriptionTop: If there are more Imerial fighters than Rebel fighters, deal 2 damage.
